description:
T1. Yew Tree	
Rear Garden/Neighbours Tree 26 Norfolk Lodge:
West Boundary/Southernmost tree.
Reduce/trim back overhang branches to the garden of 24 Park Road by 2m or to the boundary, including a section in mid-crown to open a window of light.
The tree's current height is 14m, and crown spread is 9m
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 14m and the crown spread is 8m 

T2.Yew Tree	
Rear Garden/Neighbours Tree 26 Norfolk Lodge:
West Boundary/Northernmost tree.
Reduce back overhang by 2.5m, including the sides of the tree that overhang the garden of 24 Park Road, back to the fence line.
The tree's current height is 16m, and crown spread is 14m
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 16m and the crown spread is 11.5m 

G3. Ash, Laurel, Yew	
Rear Garden/South Boundary Trees in 26 Norfolk Lodge:
Reduce/trim back all overhang to the garden of 24 back to the fence line.
(All of G3 are undersized.)
The trees and shrubs vary in size current heights between 4 and 6m, and crown spreads vary.
